str2: Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: To shout, call aloud, proclaim. Apparently a prolonged form of a primary verb; to halloo, i.e. Shout.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To make ready, prepare. From hetoimos; to prepare.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A way, road, journey, path. Apparently a primary word; a road; by implication, a progress; figuratively, a mode or means.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
Perhaps from eu and tithemi; straight, i.e. level, or true; adverbially at once.
A worn path, beaten way, road, highway. From tribo; a rut or worn track.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
